events.event-delete-confirmation: Tem certeza de que quer excluir este evento?
events.new-notification-form-description: Mealie usa a biblioteca Apprise para gerar notificações. Eles oferecem várias opções de serviços para serem usados para notificações. Consulte a wiki para um guia completo sobre como criar a URL para o seu serviço. Se disponível, selecionar o tipo de notificação pode incluir recursos extras.
events.apprise-url-skipped-if-blank: URL Apprise (ignorado se estiver em branco)
events.what-events: Quais eventos esse notificador deve subscrever?
events.when-a-user-in-your-group-creates-a-new-: Quando um usuário do seu grupo criar um plano de refeição
events.when-a-new-user-joins-your-group: Quando um novo usuário entrar no seu grupo

general.confirm-delete-generic: Você tem certeza de que deseja apagar isto?
general.name: Nome
general.subject: Assunto
general.confirm-delete-own-admin-account: Por favor, note que você está tentando excluir a sua própria conta de administrador! Esta ação não pode ser desfeita e irá excluir sua conta permanentemente?
general.this-feature-is-currently-inactive: Este recurso está desativado no momento
general.your-browser-does-not-support-clipboard: O seu navegador não suporta área de transferência
general.copied-items-to-clipboard: Nenhum item copiado para a área de transferência|Um item copiado para a área de transferência|Copiado {count} itens para a área de transferência

group.are-you-sure-you-want-to-delete-the-grou: Tem certeza que deseja excluir o grupo <b>{groupName}<b/>?
group.cannot-delete-default-group: Não é possível excluir o grupo padrão
group.cannot-delete-group-with-users: Não é possível excluir grupo com usuários
group.user-group-creation-failed: Falha ao criar grupo de usuários

settings.keep-my-recipes-private-description: Define o seu grupo e todas as receitas padrão como privadas. Você sempre pode mudar isso mais tarde.

group.manage-members-description: Gerencie as permissões dos membros em seus grupos. {manage} permite ao usuário acessar a página de gerenciamento de dados {invite} permite ao usuário gerar links de convites para outros usuários. Os proprietários de grupos não podem mudar suas próprias permissões.
group.default-recipe-preferences-description: Estas são as configurações padrão quando uma nova receita é criada no seu grupo. Elas podem ser alteradas para receitas individuais no menu de configurações de receitas.
group.private-group-description: Definir seu grupo para privado irá padronizar todas as opções de visualização para padrão. Isso substitui as configurações de visualização pública individuais.
group.allow-users-outside-of-your-group-to-see: Permitir que usuários fora do seu grupo vejam suas receitas

Quando habilitado, você pode usar um link de compartilhamento público para compartilhar receitas específicas sem autorizar o usuário. Quando desativado, você pode apenas compartilhar receitas com usuários que estão em seu grupo ou com um link privado pré-gerado
group.show-nutrition-information-description: Quando ativado, as informações da nutrição serão exibidas na receita, se disponível. Se não houver nenhuma informação nutricional disponível, as informações nutricionais não serão mostradas
group.show-recipe-assets-description: Quando ativado, os utensílios da receita serão mostrados na receita, se disponível
group.default-to-landscape-view-description: Quando ativado a seção de cabeçalho das receitas será mostrada em modo paisagem
group.disable-users-from-commenting-on-recipes: Desabilitar usuários de comentar em receitas
Oculta a seção de comentários na página de receita e desativa os comentários
group.disable-organizing-recipe-ingredients-by: Desativar a organização de ingredientes de receita por unidades e alimentos
Oculta os campos Comida, Unidade e Quantidade de ingredientes e trata os ingredientes como campos de texto simples.
group.admin-group-management-text: As alterações a este grupo serão refletidas imediatamente.

meal-plan.create-a-new-meal-plan: Criar um novo plano de refeições
meal-plan.mealplan-creation-failed: Falha ao criar Plano de Refeições
meal-plan.mealplan-deletion-failed: Falha ao excluir Plano de Refeições
meal-plan.mealplan-update-failed: Falha ao atualizar Plano de Refeições
meal-plan.no-meal-plan-defined-yet: Nenhum Plano de Refeições definido ainda
meal-plan.only-recipes-with-these-categories-will-: Apenas receitas com essas categorias serão usadas nos Planos de Refeições
meal-plan.for-all-meal-types: para todos os tipos de refeição
meal-plan.meal-plan-rules-description: You can create rules for auto selecting recipes for you meal plans. These rules are used by the server to determine the random pool of recipes to select from when creating meal plans. Note that if rules have the same day/type constraints then the categories of the rules will be merged. In practice, it's unnecessary to create duplicate rules, but it's possible to do so.
meal-plan.new-rule-description: When creating a new rule for a meal plan you can restrict the rule to be applicable for a specific day of the week and/or a specific type of meal. To apply a rule to all days or all meal types you can set the rule to "Any" which will apply it to all the possible values for the day and/or meal type.

chowdown.description-long: Mealie natively supports the chowdown repository format. Download the code repository as a .zip file and upload it below.
chowdown.title: Chowdown

nextcloud.description: Migrar dados de uma instância de Nextcloud Cookbook
nextcloud.description-long: Nextcloud recipes can be imported from a zip file that contains the data stored in Nextcloud. See the example folder structure below to ensure your recipes are able to be imported.
nextcloud.title: Livro de Receitas do Nextcloud

copymethat.description-long: Mealie can import recipes from Copy Me That. Export your recipes in HTML format, then upload the .zip below.
copymethat.title: Copy Me That Recipe Manager

paprika.description-long: Mealie can import recipes from the Paprika application. Export your recipes from paprika, rename the export extension to .zip and upload it below.
paprika.title: Paprika Recipe Manager

mealie-pre-v1.description-long: Mealie can import recipes from the Mealie application from a pre v1.0 release. Export your recipes from your old instance, and upload the zip file below. Note that only recipes can be imported from the export.
mealie-pre-v1.title: Mealie Pré v1.0

migration.recipe-data-migrations-explanation: Recipes can be migrated from another supported application to Mealie. This is a great way to get started with Mealie.
migration.nextcloud-text: Nextcloud recipes can be imported from a zip file that contains the data stored in Nextcloud. See the example folder structure below to ensure your recipes are able to be imported.
migration.chowdown-text: Mealie natively supports the chowdown repository format. Download the code repository as a .zip file and upload it below
migration.paprika-text: Mealie can import recipes from the Paprika application. Export your recipes from paprika, rename the export extension to .zip and upload it below.
migration.mealie-text: Mealie can import recipes from the Mealie application from a pre v1.0 release. Export your recipes from your old instance, and upload the zip file below. Note that only recipes can be imported from the export.

new-recipe.error-details: Only websites containing ld+json or microdata can be imported by Mealie. Most major recipe websites support this data structure. If your site cannot be imported but there is json data in the log, please submit a github issue with the URL and data.
new-recipe.error-title: Looks Like We Couldn't Find Anything
new-recipe.paste-in-your-recipe-data-each-line-will: Cole os dados da sua receita. Cada linha será tratado como um item em uma lista
new-recipe.upload-individual-zip-file: Enviar um arquivo .zip individual exportado a partir de outra instância do Mealie.
new-recipe.url-form-hint: Copie e cole um link do seu site de receita favorito
new-recipe.trim-whitespace-description: Trim leading and trailing whitespace as well as blank lines
new-recipe.trim-prefix-description: Trim first character from each line
new-recipe.split-by-numbered-line-description: Attempts to split a paragraph by matching '1)' or '1.' patterns
new-recipe.make-recipe-image: Tornar esta a imagem da receita

recipe.delete-confirmation: Você tem certeza que deseja apagar esta receita?
recipe.save-recipe-before-use: Salve a receita antes de utilizar
recipe.share-recipe-message: Eu quero compartilhar minha receita de {0} com você.
recipe.title: Título
recipe.unable-to-delete-recipe: Não foi possível apagar a receita
recipe.add-recipe-to-mealplan: Adicionar receita ao Plano de Refeições
recipe.recipe-added-to-mealplan: Receita adicionada ao plano de refeições
recipe.failed-to-add-recipe-to-mealplan: Falha ao adicionar a receita ao plano de refeições
recipe.edit-timeline-event: Editar Linha do Tempo do Evento
recipe.timeline-is-empty: Nada na linha do tempo ainda. Tente fazer esta receita!
recipe.api-extras-description: Recipes extras are a key feature of the Mealie API. They allow you to create custom json key/value pairs within a recipe to reference from 3rd part applications. You can use these keys to contain information to trigger automation or custom messages to relay to your desired device.
recipe.attach-images-hint: Attach images by dragging & dropping them into the editor
recipe.enable-ingredient-amounts-to-use-this-fe: Enable ingredient amounts to use this feature
recipe.recipes-with-units-or-foods-defined-cann: Recipes with units or foods defined cannot be parsed.
recipe.select-one-of-the-various-ways-to-create: Select one of the various ways to create a recipe
recipe.create-recipe-from-an-image: Criar Receita a partir de uma imagem
recipe.create-a-recipe-by-providing-the-name-al: Create a recipe by providing the name. All recipes must have unique names.
recipe.new-recipe-names-must-be-unique: Novos nomes de receitas devem ser únicos
recipe.scrape-recipe-description: Scrape a recipe by url. Provide the url for the site you want to scrape, and Mealie will attempt to scrape the recipe from that site and add it to your collection.
recipe.import-from-zip-description: Import a single recipe that was exported from another Mealie instance.
recipe.zip-files-must-have-been-exported-from-m: .zip files must have been exported from Mealie
recipe.create-a-recipe-by-uploading-a-scan: Create a recipe by uploading a scan.
recipe.upload-a-png-image-from-a-recipe-book: Upload a png image from a recipe book
recipe.recipe-bulk-importer-description: The Bulk recipe importer allows you to import multiple recipes at once by queueing the sites on the backend and running the task in the background. This can be useful when initially migrating to Mealie, or when you want to import a large number of recipes.
recipe.bulk-import-process-has-started: Processo de importação em massa iniciado
recipe.bulk-import-process-has-failed: Processo de importação em massa falhou
recipe.recipe-debugger-description: Grab the URL of the recipe you want to debug and paste it here. The URL will be scraped by the recipe scraper and the results will be displayed. If you don't see any data returned, the site you are trying to scrape is not supported by Mealie or its scraper library.

backup.error-creating-backup-see-log-file: Erro ao Criar Backup. Consulte o Arquivo de Log
backup.unable-to-delete-backup: Não foi possível apagar o backup.
backup.experimental-description: Backups a total snapshots of the database and data directory of the site. This includes all data and cannot be set to exclude subsets of data. You can think off this as a snapshot of Mealie at a specific time. Currently, {not-crossed-version} (data migrations are not done automatically). These serve as a database agnostic way to export and import data or backup the site to an external location.
backup.not-crossed-version: this backup mechanism is not cross-version and therefore cannot be used to migrate data between versions
backup.back-restore-description: Restoring this backup will overwrite all the current data in your database and in the data directory and replace them with the contents of this backup. {cannot-be-undone} If the restoration is successful, you will be logged out.
backup.cannot-be-undone: This action cannot be undone - use with caution.
backup.postgresql-note: If you are using PostGreSQL, please review the {backup-restore-process} prior to restoring.
backup.irreversible-acknowledgment: Eu entendo que esta ação é irreversível, destrutiva e pode causar perda de dados

settings.remove-existing-entries-matching-importe: Remove existing entries matching imported entries

theme.error-creating-theme-see-log-file: Erro ao criar tema. Consulte o arquivo de log.
theme.theme-name-is-required: O nome do tema é obrigatório.

token.copy-this-token-for-use-with-an-external: Copie este código para uso com um aplicativo externo. Este código não estará visível novamente.
token.you-have-token-count: You have no active tokens.|You have one active token.|You have {count} active tokens.

toolbox.recipes-affected: Nenhuma Receita Afetada|Uma Receita Afetada|{count} Receitas Afetadas

webhooks.the-urls-listed-below-will-recieve-webho: The URLs listed below will receive webhooks containing the recipe data for the meal plan on it's scheduled day. Currently Webhooks will execute at
webhooks.description: The webhooks defined below will be executed when a meal is defined for the day. At the scheduled time the webhooks will be sent with the data from the recipe that is scheduled for the day. Note that webhook execution is not exact. The webhooks are executed on a 5 minutes interval so the webhooks will be executed within 5 +/- minutes of the scheduled.

settings.bug-report-information: Use this information to report a bug. Providing details of your instance to developers is the best way to get your issues resolved quickly.
settings.docker-volume-help: Mealie requires that the frontend container and the backend share the same docker volume or storage. This ensures that the frontend container can properly access the images and assets stored on disk.
settings.status-unknown-try-running-a-validation: Status Unknown. Try running a validation.
settings.application-version-error-text: Your current version ({0}) does not match the latest release. Considering updating to the latest version ({1}).
settings.secure-site-error-text: Serve via localhost or secure with https. Clipboard and additional browser APIs may not work.
settings.secure-site-success-text: Site is accessed by localhost or https
settings.server-side-base-url-error-text: `BASE_URL` is still the default value on API Server. This will cause issues with notifications links generated on the server for emails, etc.
settings.server-side-base-url-success-text: Server Side URL does not match the default
settings.ldap-ready-error-text: Not all LDAP Values are configured. This can be ignored if you are not using LDAP Authentication.
settings.ldap-ready-success-text: Required LDAP variables are all set.

shopping-list.label: Marcador
shopping-list.linked-item-warning: This item is linked to one or more recipe. Adjusting the units or foods will yield unexpected results when adding or removing the recipe from this list.
shopping-list.are-you-sure-you-want-to-delete-this-ite: Tem certeza que deseja remover este item?
shopping-list.linked-recipes-count: No Linked Recipes|One Linked Recipe|{count} Linked Recipes
shopping-list.items-checked-count: No items checked|One item checked|{count} items checked

signup.welcome-to-mealie: Welcome to Mealie! To become a user of this instance you are required to have a valid invitation link. If you haven't recieved an invitation you are unable to sign-up. To recieve a link, contact the sites administrator.

user.are-you-sure-you-want-to-delete-the-link: Are you sure you want to delete the link <b>{link}<b/>?
user.are-you-sure-you-want-to-delete-the-user: Are you sure you want to delete the user <b>{activeName} ID: {activeId}<b/>?
user.error-cannot-delete-super-user: Erro! Não é possível excluir Super Usuário
user.password-has-been-reset-to-the-default-p: A senha foi redefinida para a senha padrão
user.use-8-characters-or-more-for-your-passwo: Use 8 caracteres ou mais para sua senha
user.you-are-not-allowed-to-create-a-user: You are not allowed to create a user
user.you-are-not-allowed-to-delete-this-user: You are not allowed to delete this user
user.enable-advanced-content-description: Enables advanced features like Recipe Scaling, API keys, Webhooks, and Data Management. Don't worry, you can always change this later
user.please-enter-your-email-and-password: Please enter your email and password
user.account-locked-please-try-again-later: Account Locked. Please try again later
user.authentication-method-hint: This specifies how a user will authenticate with Mealie. If you're not sure, choose 'Mealie
user.user-can-invite-other-to-group: User can invite other to group

language-dialog.select-description: Choose the language for the Mealie UI. The setting only applies to you, not other users.
language-dialog.how-to-contribute-description: Is something not translated yet, mistranslated, or your language missing from the list? {read-the-docs-link} on how to contribute!

foods.merge-dialog-text: Combining the selected foods will merge the source food and target food into a single food. The source food will be deleted and all of the references to the source food will be updated to point to the target food.
foods.seed-dialog-text: Seed the database with foods based on your local language. This will create 200+ common foods that can be used to organize your database. Foods are translated via a community effort.
foods.seed-dialog-warning: You have already have some items in your database. This action will not reconcile duplicates, you will have to manage them manually.

units.seed-dialog-text: Seed the database with common units based on your local language.
units.combine-unit-description: Combining the selected units will merge the Source Unit and Target Unit into a single unit. The {source-unit-will-be-deleted} and all of the references to the Source Unit will be updated to point to the Target Unit.

labels.seed-dialog-text: Seed the database with common labels based on your local language.

recipes.are-you-sure-you-want-to-delete-all-expo: Are you sure you want to delete all export data?
recipes.confirm-delete-recipes: Are you sure you want to delete the following recipes? This action cannot be undone.
recipes.the-following-recipes-selected-length-wi: The following recipes ({0}) will be exported.
recipes.settings-chosen-explanation: Settings chosen here, excluding the locked option, will be applied to all selected recipes.
recipes.recipe-data-description: Use this section to manage the data associated with your recipes. You can perform several bulk actions on your recipes including exporting, deleting, tagging, and assigning categories.
recipes.data-exports-description: This section provides links to available exports that are ready to download. These exports do expire, so be sure to grab them while they're still available.

data-pages.data-management-description: Select which data set you want to make changes to.

user-registration.provide-registration-token-description: Please provide the registration token associated with the group that you'd like to join. You'll need to obtain this from an existing group member.
user-registration.group-details-description: Before you create an account you'll need to create a group. Your group will only contain you, but you'll be able to invite others later. Members in your group can share meal plans, shopping lists, recipes, and more!
user-registration.use-seed-data-description: Mealie ships with a collection of Foods, Units, and Labels that can be used to populate your group with helpful data for organizing your recipes.

banner-experimental.title: Experimental Feature
banner-experimental.description: This page contains experimental or still-baking features. Please excuse the mess.

demo.info_message_with_version: This is a Demo for version: {version}

help.selection-mode-desc: The selection mode is the main mode that can be used to enter data:

selection-mode-steps.draw: Draw a rectangle on the text you want to select.
selection-mode-steps.click: Click on any field on the right and then click back on the rectangle above the image.
selection-mode-steps.result: The selected text will appear inside the previously selected field.

help.pan-and-zoom-desc: Select pan and zoom by clicking the icon. This mode allows to zoom inside the image and move around to make using big images easier.

split-modes.line-mode-desc: In line mode, the text will be propagated by keeping the original line breaks. This mode is useful when using bulk add on a list of ingredients where one ingredient is one line.
split-modes.block-mode-desc: In block mode, the text will be split in blocks. This mode is useful when bulk adding instructions that are usually written in paragraphs.
split-modes.flat-mode-desc: In flat mode, the text will be added to the selected recipe field with no line breaks.

maintenance.action-clean-directories-description: Removes all the recipe folders that are not valid UUIDs
maintenance.action-clean-temporary-files-description: Removes all files and folders in the .temp directory
maintenance.action-clean-images-description: Removes all the images that don't end with .webp
maintenance.actions-description: Maintenance actions are {destructive_in_bold} and should be used with caution. Performing any of these actions is {irreversible_in_bold}.

admin.ingredients-natural-language-processor-e: Mealie uses Conditional Random Fields (CRFs) for parsing and processing ingredients. The model used for ingredients is based off a data set of over 100,000 ingredients from a dataset compiled by the New York Times. Note that as the model is trained in English only, you may have varied results when using the model in other languages. This page is a playground for testing the model.

It's not perfect, but it yields great results in general and is a good starting point for manually parsing ingredients into individual fields. Alternatively, you can also use the "Brute" processor that uses a pattern matching technique to identify ingredients.
admin.background-tasks-description: Here you can view all the running background tasks and their status

profile.description: Manage your profile, recipes, and group settings.
profile.account-summary-description: Here's a summary of your group's information
profile.group-statistics-description: Your Group Statistics provide some insight how you're using Mealie.
profile.storage-capacity-description: Your storage capacity is a calculation of the images and assets you have uploaded.
profile.personal-description: These are settings that are personal to you. Changes here won't affect other users
profile.user-settings-description: Manage your preferences, change your password, and update your email
profile.api-tokens-description: Manage your API Tokens for access from external applications
profile.group-description: These items are shared within your group. Editing one of them will change it for the whole group!
profile.group-settings-description: Manage your common group settings like mealplan and privacy settings.
profile.cookbooks-description: Manage a collection of recipe categories and generate pages for them.
profile.members-description: See who's in your group and manage their permissions.
profile.webhooks-description: Setup webhooks that trigger on days that you have have mealplan scheduled.
profile.notifiers-description: Setup email and push notifications that trigger on specific events.
profile.manage-data-description: Manage your Food and Units (more options coming soon)
profile.data-migrations-description: Migrate your existing data from other applications like Nextcloud Recipes and Chowdown
profile.show-advanced-description: Show advanced features (API Keys, Webhooks, and Data Management)

cookbook.description: Cookbooks are another way to organize recipes by creating cross sections of recipes and tags. Creating a cookbook will add an entry to the side-bar and all the recipes with the tags and categories chosen will be displayed in the cookbook.
cookbook.public-cookbook-description: Public Cookbooks can be shared with non-mealie users and will be displayed on your groups page.
cookbook.filter-options-description: When require all is selected the cookbook will only include recipes that have all of the items selected. This applies to each subset of selectors and not a cross section of the selected items.
